attributes.action: Support people that are born in the UK to be a british citizen by birth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i voted for the labour party last year,and was going to vote for him again this year,but i hve been thinking...maybe gordon brown could actually help me instead of me taking it to the national papers...i have been refused the right to a british passport,i havent been on holiday for 7 years which is disgusting.so if anyone wants to help me out,please sign the petition...

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
